verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Mahalath. Maschil of David. The fool <WH5036> hath said <WH559> in his heart <WH3820>, There is no God <WH430>. Corrupt <WH7843> are they <WH8581>, and have done abominable iniquity <WH5766>; There is none that doeth <WH6213> good <WH2896>.

God <WH430> looked down <WH8259> from heaven <WH8064> upon the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>, To see <WH7200> if there were <WH3426> any that did understand <WH7919>, That did seek <WH1875> after God <WH430>.
Every one of them is gone back <WH5472>; They are together <WH3162> become filthy <WH444>; There is none that doeth <WH6213> good <WH2896>, no <WH259>, not one.
Have the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> no knowledge <WH3045>, Who eat up <WH398> my people <WH5971> as they eat <WH398> bread <WH3899>, And call <WH7121> not upon God <WH430>?

There were they in great <WH6343> fear <WH6342>, where no fear <WH6343> was <WH430>; For God hath scattered <WH6340> the bones <WH6106> of him that encampeth <WH2583> against thee <WH954>: Thou hast put them to shame, because of God <WH430> hath rejected them <WH3988>.

Oh that <WH5414> the salvation <WH3444> of Israel <WH3478> were come out of Zion <WH6726>! When God <WH430> bringeth back <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of his people <WH5971>, Then shall Jacob <WH3290> rejoice <WH1523>, and Israel <WH3478> shall be glad <WH8055>.
